title: The Systems Biology of Exercise
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText:
The aims of this award are to stimulate collaboration and academic exchange between UK and Japan. This award has supported:
1) short term (1-2 month) exchanges for 4 junior investigators from UK to Japan
2) short term (1-2 weeks) exchanges for 21 junior investigators from Japan to UK
3) An international conference on the Systems Biology of Exercise at the University of Leeds
4) Publication of 3 full papers, 1 paper submitted, and at least 3 peer reviewed abstracts Healthcare,Leisure Activities, including Sports, Recreation and Tourism,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology Cultural,Societal
findingsText:
The aims of this award are to stimulate collaboration and academic exchange between UK and Japan. This award has supported:
1) short term (1-2 month) exchanges for 4 junior investigators from UK to Japan
2) short term (1-2 weeks) exchanges for 21 junior investigators from Japan to UK
3) An international conference on the Systems Biology of Exercise at the University of Leeds
4) Publication of 3 full papers, 1 paper submitted, and at least 3 peer reviewed abstracts Aided the development of junior researchers as they progress from PhD students to Faculty members. To date, we know of 7 junior researchers supported whom have secured Faculty or new postdoctoral research positions Healthcare,Leisure Activities, including Sports, Recreation and Tourism,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
